author: rgoldouz
body:
Hello,

The parameters in the following gen card is not appropriate for our studies in phase2 L1 track triggers. 
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/Configuration/Generator/python/FlatRandomPtAndDxyGunProducer_cfi.py 

In order to be used in relval sample production, I have made a new card with proper parameters. My relval request is in 
https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/PDMVRELVALS-116

Please merge this card into the CMSSW to be used for the official relval sample generation.

Thanks,
Reza
title: Displaced muon with new parameters for the Phase2 L1 tracker studies
